name: Music_2859.wav
keywords: ['guided meditation', 'soothing', 'relaxing', 'synth pad', 'birds chirping', 'synth melody', 'female voice speaking', 'slow tempo']
caption: This audio contains a synth drone playing in the lower midrange and other synthesizer sounds on top. One of them is playing a melody in a higher pitch. A female voice is talking along to the music. The whole recording is full of reverb. This song may be playing during meditation or while falling asleep.
